Name: Live with Kelly and Mark
Title: Sizzle in the City
Desc: Jon Hamm ("Your Friends & Neighbors"); Michael Symon brings recipes; The Doobie Brothers perform.
LongDescription: Jon Hamm ("Your Friends & Neighbors"); Michael Symon brings summer recipes; ways to keep kids active in the summer; Steve Patterson hits the streets, Father's Day style; The Doobie Brothers perform.
